
▗ ▗   ▖ ▖  Claude Code v2.1.23
           Haiku 4.5 · Claude Max
  ▘▘ ▝▝    ~/Developer/claudeless

❯ /help
────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────
 ─Claude Code v2.1.23 general  commands ─ custom-commands (←/→ or tab to cycle)


  Claude understands your codebase, makes edits with your permission, and
  executes commands — right from your terminal.
  / for commandse   shift + Tab to auto-accept ut    ctrl + z to suspend undo
  @ for file        ctrl + o for verbose output      ctrl + g to edit in ompt
  & for             shift + ⏎ for newlines           /keybindings to customize
  background

 For more help: https://code.claude.com/docs/en/overview
